channel.title: Neon Knights - by Toothfairy Stardust
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/toothfairystardust
Hello Auxyfriends!
I've made an uptempo instrumental track with some videogame and 80s touches to it. I'm about to finish 3 tracks for a release. I'm in the middle of finishing the details for the songs and trying to mix at the same time to get a feel for the final thing. If some of you can listen and give me some constructive feedback on what I can do better in the mix, or what I'm doing right, it would be super helpful. Im not much of a music mixer guy so go nutz.
Currently the project is exported from Auxy and set up in Pro Tools, so I have all the tools i need to get it good. The problem is that I'm no so good :slightly_smiling_face:
Hope you like the song as well!
